property.name: ranger.usersync.port
property.description: Port for unix authentication service, run within usersync

property.name: ranger.usersync.ssl
property.description: SSL enabled? (ranger admin -> usersync communication)

property.name: ranger.usersync.keystore.file
property.description: Keystore file used for usersync

property.name: ranger.usersync.keystore.password
property.description: Keystore password

property.name: ranger.usersync.truststore.file
property.description: Truststore used for usersync, required if usersync -> ranger admin communication is SSL enabled

property.name: ranger.usersync.truststore.password
property.description: Truststore password

property.name: ranger.usersync.passwordvalidator.path
property.description: Native program for password validation

property.name: ranger.usersync.enabled
property.description: Usersync enabled?

property.name: ranger.usersync.sink.impl.class
property.description: Class to be used as sink (to sync users into ranger admin)

property.name: ranger.usersync.policymanager.baseURL
property.description: URL to be used by clients to access ranger admin, use FQDN

property.name: ranger.usersync.policymanager.maxrecordsperapicall
property.description: How many records to be returned per API call

property.name: ranger.usersync.policymanager.mockrun
property.description: Is user sync doing mock run?

property.name: ranger.usersync.unix.minUserId
property.description: Only sync users above this user id (applicable for UNIX)

property.name: ranger.usersync.sleeptimeinmillisbetweensynccycle
property.description: Sleeptime interval in milliseconds, if < 1000 then default to 30 sec

property.name: ranger.usersync.source.impl.class
property.description: For Ldap: org.apache.ranger.ldapusersync.process.LdapUserGroupBuilder, For Unix: org.apache.ranger.unixusersync.process.UnixUserGroupBuilder, org.apache.ranger.unixusersync.process.FileSourceUserGroupBuilder

property.name: ranger.usersync.filesource.file
property.description: /tmp/usergroup.json or /tmp/usergroup.csv or /tmp/usergroup.txt

property.name: ranger.usersync.filesource.text.delimiter
property.description: Delimiter used in file, if File based user sync is used

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.url
property.description: LDAP server URL

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.binddn
property.description: Full distinguished name (DN), including common name (CN), of an LDAP user account that has privileges to search for users.

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.ldapbindpassword
property.description: Password for the account that can search for users.

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.bindalias
property.description: Set as ranger.usersync.ldap.bindalias (string as is)

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.bindkeystore
property.description: Set same value as ranger.usersync.keystore.file property i.e default value /usr/hdp/current/ranger-usersync/conf/ugsync.jceks

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.searchBase
property.description: "# search base for users and groups # sample value would be dc=hadoop,dc=apache,dc=org"

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.user.searchbase
property.description: "# search base for users # sample value would be ou=users,dc=hadoop,dc=apache,dc=org # overrides value specified in ranger.usersync.ldap.searchBase"

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.user.searchscope
property.description: "# search scope for the users, only base, one and sub are supported values # please customize the value to suit your deployment # default value: sub"

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.user.objectclass
property.description: LDAP User Object Class

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.user.searchfilter
property.description: "optional additional filter constraining the users selected for syncing # a sample value would be (dept=eng) # please customize the value to suit your deployment # default value is empty"

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.user.nameattribute
property.description: LDAP user name attribute

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.referral
property.description: Set to follow if multiple LDAP servers are configured to return continuation references for results. Set to ignore (default) if no referrals should be followed

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.user.groupnameattribute
property.description: LDAP user group name attribute

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.username.caseconversion
property.description: User name case conversion

property.name: ranger.usersync.ldap.groupname.caseconversion
property.description: Group name case conversion

property.name: ranger.usersync.logdir
property.description: User sync log directory

property.name: ranger.usersync.group.searchenabled
property.description: "# do we want to do ldapsearch to find groups instead of relying on user entry attributes # valid values: true, false # any value other than true would be treated as false # default value: false"

property.name: ranger.usersync.group.usermapsyncenabled
property.description: User map sync enabled?

property.name: ranger.usersync.group.searchbase
property.description: "# search base for groups # sample value would be ou=groups,dc=hadoop,dc=apache,dc=org # overrides value specified in ranger.usersync.ldap.searchBase, ranger.usersync.ldap.user.searchbase # if a value is not specified, takes the value of ranger.usersync.ldap.searchBase # if ranger.usersync.ldap.searchBase is also not specified, takes the value of ranger.usersync.ldap.user.searchbase"

property.name: ranger.usersync.group.searchscope
property.description: "# search scope for the groups, only base, one and sub are supported values # please customize the value to suit your deployment # default value: sub"

property.name: ranger.usersync.group.searchfilter
property.description: "# optional additional filter constraining the groups selected for syncing # a sample value would be (dept=eng) # please customize the value to suit your deployment # default value is empty"

property.name: ranger.usersync.group.nameattribute
property.description: LDAP group name attribute

property.name: ranger.usersync.group.memberattributename
property.description: LDAP group member attribute name

property.name: ranger.usersync.pagedresultsenabled
property.description: Results can be paged?

property.name: ranger.usersync.pagedresultssize
property.description: Page size

property.name: ranger.usersync.credstore.filename
property.description: Credential store file name for user sync, specify full path
